mapper.select: select station_name from station where station_id = #{stationId}
select station_id from station where station_name = #{stationName}
select station_id from station where city = #{city}
SELECT distinct city, city_code FROM station
select station_name from station where city_code = #{code}
select station_id from station where city_code = #{code}

SELECT r.station_sequence AS sequence, s.station_name AS stationName,
CASE WHEN r.station_sequence = 1 THEN NULL ELSE DATE_FORMAT( ADDTIME( CONCAT(dt.departure_date, ' ', t.departure_time), SEC_TO_TIME(r.arrival_time_offset * 60) ), '%H:%i' ) END AS arrivalTime,
CASE WHEN r.station_sequence = max_seq.max_sequence THEN NULL ELSE DATE_FORMAT( ADDTIME( ADDTIME( CONCAT(dt.departure_date, ' ', t.departure_time), SEC_TO_TIME(r.arrival_time_offset * 60) ), SEC_TO_TIME(COALESCE(r.stop_duration, 0) * 60) ), '%H:%i' ) END AS departureTime, COALESCE(r.stop_duration, 0) AS stopoverTime FROM daily_train dt JOIN train t ON dt.train_number = t.train_number JOIN route r ON t.train_number = r.train_number JOIN station s ON r.station_id = s.station_id
JOIN ( SELECT train_number, MAX(station_sequence) AS max_sequence FROM route GROUP BY train_number ) max_seq ON r.train_number = max_seq.train_number WHERE dt.train_id = #{trainId} ORDER BY r.station_sequence
select distinct city_code from station where city = #{city}
